bibl.title: Report on the Season in Firan-Sinaï (February-March 1992).
bibl.note: 1. Further excavations in the Episcopal Church of Pharan. - 2. Results of the trial trenches in the Town Church. - 3. Excavations in the Middle Church on Gabal Tahuna. - 4. The new chapel at the south-east slope of the acropolis. - 5. Methods for restoration. - 6. Some select finds. - 7. The ceramics. - 8. Inscriptions and rock graffiti from Gabal Tahuna.
bibl.seg: GROSSMANN Peter, Michael JONES and ANdreas REICHERT, Report on the Season in Firan-Sinaï (February-March 1992).
BZ 89 (1996) pp. 11-36, 11 figg. et pll. II-VIII.

1. Further excavations in the Episcopal Church of Pharan. - 2. Results of the trial trenches in the Town Church. - 3. Excavations in the Middle Church on Gabal Tahuna. - 4. The new chapel at the south-east slope of the acropolis. - 5. Methods for restoration. - 6. Some select finds. - 7. The ceramics. - 8. Inscriptions and rock graffiti from Gabal Tahuna.
